item.description:
Welcome everyone. To kick-off this new group, let's start with a cookout where we can all get aquainted, think up some future activities, and just relax and have some fun. Join us for a cookout in Old Saybrook, near the beach. Hopefully the September weather will hold out for us!

BYOB

I'll be sending out directions to those who respond yes.
item.name: Kick-off Cookout
